name: Power Artifact

rulings.text: Only affects the generic mana part of activation costs. Colored parts of mana costs are not affected.
Can be placed on artifacts with no or zero activation costs, but this has no effect on them. It does not increase the cost to one.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact's activated abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
